item.title: 普京在法国的投资显示俄罗斯原子能仍在增长
item.description: 俄罗斯对核电供应链的控制正在加强，而其为欧洲反应堆提供燃料的最新冒险行为，正引起这个背弃核电技术的国家的愤怒。【原文：Russia’s grip on the supply chain for nuclear power is strengthening, and its latest venture to feed Europe’s reactors is prompting outrage in a country that’s turned its back on the technology.】

item.title: 土耳其出台新规保护里拉，冷却信贷需求
item.description: 土耳其中央银行宣布采取新措施，在本月底地方选举之前抑制信用卡消费，遏制对硬通货的需求。【原文：Turkey’s central bank announced new measures to curb credit-card spending and deter demand for hard currencies ahead of local elections at the end of the month.】

item.title: 在约旦长期执政后，瑞士没有改变瑞士央行的迹象
item.description: 如果瑞士真的想改革其中央银行，那么它现在就有了多年来最好的机会。【原文：Switzerland could have the best chance in years to revamp its central bank right now, if the country actually wanted it.】

item.title: 穆迪将西班牙增长模式的前景展望上调至正面
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将西班牙的信用状况展望上调为积极，原因是预测西班牙将实现稳健的经济增长和债务比率下降。【原文：Spain’s credit profile outlook was lifted to positive at Moody’s Ratings, on the back of forecasts for solid economic growth and declining debt ratios.】

item.title: 宜家计划在韩国斥资 3.27 亿美元赢得市场份额
item.description: 瑞典家具制造商宜家计划未来三年在韩国投入约 3 亿欧元（约合 3.27 亿美元），以扩大在这个亚洲国家的市场份额。【原文：Swedish furniture maker Ikea plans to spend about 300 million euros ($327 million) in South Korea over the next three years to increase market share in the Asian country.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚国家石油公司寻求重写宪法以实现议程授权
item.description: 哥伦比亚第一位左派总统正在寻求修改宪法，以实施他的激进议程，此前他的计划一直受到这个传统上保守的南美国家的立法机构、法院和监管机构的阻挠。【原文：Colombia’s first leftist president is seeking a constitutional change to implement his radical agenda after being stymied by the traditionally conservative South American nation’s legislature, courts and regulatory agencies.】

item.title: 印度小盘股震荡吸引低价买家入市
item.description: 尽管证券监管机构发出了潜在泡沫的警告，但一些投资者仍将本月印度小型股票的暴跌视为买入机会。【原文：This month’s meltdown in India’s smaller stocks is being termed as a buying opportunity by some investors despite the securities regulator’s warnings of a potential bubble.】

item.title: 通货紧缩袭来，中国Z世代热捧金豆
item.description: 面对中国 15 年来最严重的通货紧缩、动荡的股市和过低的银行利率，18 岁的 Tina Hong 将自己的财务安全寄托在了金豆上。【原文：With China’s deflation at its worst in 15 years, a volatile stock market and bank interest rates too low for her liking, 18-year-old Tina Hong is placing her financial security in gold beans.】

item.title: SBF 考虑在 FTX 崩溃之际 "以共和党人的身份出柜
item.description: 在 FTX 破产后，山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）想了很多办法来恢复自己的形象，并推出一家新的加密货币交易所。【原文：Sam Bankman-Fried came up with a lot of ideas to rehabilitate his image and launch a new crypto exchange after FTX went into bankruptcy.】

item.title: 埃克森公司称发现圭亚那新石油储量
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（ExxonMobil Corp.）称，它在圭亚那附近海域发现了新的石油，圭亚那是南美国家委内瑞拉的邻国，最近在该国发现了大量石油。【原文：ExxonMobil Corp. says it found new oil in the waters off Guyana, the South American nation neighboring Venezuela where major oil discoveries have been made recently.】

item.title: 美国警告欧盟重启钢铁案将破坏世贸组织改革
item.description: 美国告诉欧盟，如果它在世界贸易组织重启针对华盛顿的特朗普时代钢铝争端案件，那么欧盟修复多边贸易合作支柱的努力将面临失败的风险。【原文：The US told the European Union that if it reopened a case at the World Trade Organization against Washington over a Trump-era steel and aluminum dispute then it would risk sinking the bloc’s attempt to fix a pillar of multilateral trade cooperation.】

item.title: 巴西将利用二十国集团在冲突僵局中推动联合国改革
item.description: 巴西的一位高级特使表示，巴西希望利用今年担任 20 国集团主席国的机会，推动联合国进行改革，使该组织在解决世界冲突方面更具相关性。【原文：Brazil wants to use the nation’s presidency of the Group of 20 nations this year to push for changes at the United Nations to make the organization more relevant for solving the world’s conflicts, according to a top envoy from the country.】

item.title: 英伟达历史性反弹连续第 10 周创纪录
item.description: 英伟达公司 2024 年的历史性反弹不断刷新纪录。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s historic 2024 rally keeps piling on records.】

item.title: 穆迪因姆努钦注资上调纽约市银行信贷评级
item.description: 在这家陷入困境的贷款机构获得史蒂文-姆努钦（Steven Mnuchin）领导的投资者注资后，穆迪投资者服务公司（Moody's Investors Service）上调了纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）的信用评级，但该评级仍为垃圾级。【原文：New York Community Bancorp’s credit rating was raised by Moody’s Investors Service after the embattled lender landed a capital injection from investors led by Steven Mnuchin, though the grade remained in junk territory.】

item.title: 穆迪上调乌拉圭评级，原因是采取了旨在促进增长的措施
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）提高了乌拉圭的信用评分，理由是乌拉圭最近批准了一系列旨在促进经济增长的措施。【原文：Uruguay’s credit score was lifted by Moody’s Ratings, which cited the recent approval of a set of measures aimed at boosting economic growth.】

item.title: 华尔街末日预言在 2016 年以来最热反弹中落空
item.description: 华尔街的忧虑者告诉我们，随着 2023 年的临近，全球最大的金融市场正在驶入危险地带。【原文：In the telling of Wall Street worrywarts, as 2023 drew to a close, the biggest financial markets on the planet were heading into the danger zone.】

item.title: 传统比特币基金在美国 ETF 大卖后大量套现
item.description: 在美国，对现货比特币 ETF 的狂热正在使多年前就率先将加密货币带入基金界的投资产品付出沉重代价。【原文：The frenzy for spot-Bitcoin ETFs in the US is taking a heavy toll on years-old investment products that had led the way in bringing cryptocurrencies to the fund world.】

item.title: 大麻种植商 Ascend 寻求私人贷款进行债务再融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，大麻生产商Ascend Wellness Holdings Inc.已向私人信贷公司寻求新的贷款，以对其未偿债务进行再融资。【原文：Cannabis producer Ascend Wellness Holdings Inc. has reached out to private credit firms for a new loan that will refinance its outstanding debt, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称法国离欧洲央行 2% 的通胀目标不远了
item.description: 弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）说，法国的通货膨胀率距离欧洲中央银行设定的2%的目标并不遥远。【原文：Inflation in France is not far from the European Central Bank’s 2% target, Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: 了解纽约社区银行的暴跌及其拯救交易
item.description: 每次银行危机都有赢家和输家。2023 年 3 月，当一系列地区性银行纷纷倒闭时，纽约社区银行看起来就像是赢家之一，它在 Signature Bank 倒闭后收购了该银行的部分股权。但一年后，纽约社区银行自己也需要援助：在由美国前财政部长史蒂文-姆努钦（Steven Mnuchin）领导的一批投资者介入，向该公司注资约 10 亿美元之前，纽约社区银行的市值下跌了约三分之二。至少就目前而言，投资者似乎可以放心了。【原文：Every banking crisis has winners and losers. When a string of regional banks melted down in March 2023, New York Community Bancorp looked like one of those winners, picking up parts of Signature Bank after it was shut down. But a year later, NYCB needed assistance of its own: Its market value fell by about two-thirds before a group of investors led by former US Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin stepped in to inject about $1 billion of capital into the firm. For now, at least, investors seem assu】

item.title: 页岩勘探者增加石油钻探，威胁增长目标
item.description: 在原油价格不断上涨的背景下，页岩勘探者的热情再次高涨，石油钻探活动达到了半年来的最高水平。【原文：Shale explorers are heating up again, boosting oil drilling activity to the highest level in half a year amid rising crude prices.】

item.title: 债券市场逆势上扬，估值升至三年新高
item.description: 从某种程度上说，州政府和地方政府债券收益率与国债相比已下滑至近三年来的最低水平，对这些证券的持续推动在很大程度上使其免受固定收益市场其他领域大跌的影响。【原文：By one measure, state and local government bond yields have slid to the lowest levels against Treasuries in nearly three years, with a steady push into the securities largely sheltering them from the selloff seen in other corners of fixed-income markets.】

item.title: 波音公司的麻烦有可能加剧航空公司的熊市忧虑
item.description: 由于燃料价格波动和波音公司（Boeing Co.）的问题日益严重，引发了对飞机交付延迟的担忧，美国航空股正在经历自10月份以来最严重的两周连跌。【原文：US airline stocks are heading for the worst two-week losing streak since October as volatile fuel prices and the mounting troubles at Boeing Co. tear through the industry, spurring concerns about aircraft delivery delays.】

item.title: 印度市场监管机构将对部分股票进行即时交收测试
item.description: 印度证券监管机构周五批准在 25 只股票上试行当日结算，以吸引那些回避直接押注股票而青睐更复杂的衍生产品的散户投资者。【原文：India’s securities regulator on Friday approved a soft launch of its proposed same-day settlement in 25 stocks, as it attempts to lure back retail investors who are shunning direct bets on shares in favor of more complex derivative products.】

item.title: 即使俱乐部持续亏损，Soho House 仍吸引了众多会员
item.description: Soho House & Co Inc.表示，尽管该公司继续在盈利方面挣扎，但其高级俱乐部的会员人数去年仍增长了 20%。【原文：Soho House & Co Inc. said membership at its exclusive clubs rose 20% last year, even as the company continues to struggle with profitability.】

item.title: 奇货通讯比特币与半导体股票的较量
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看每周一期的《奇货》时事通讯，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。乔今天不在，所以只有特蕾西。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and economy. Joe is away today so it’s just Tracy.】

item.title: 对冲基金亏损，Brevan Howard 裁员约 10
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，亿万富翁艾伦-霍华德（Alan Howard）共同创立的对冲基金布雷万-霍华德资产管理公司（Brevan Howard Asset Management）正在裁减约二十多名交易员，约占总人数的 10%。【原文：Brevan Howard Asset Management, the hedge fund co-founded by billionaire Alan Howard, is cutting about two dozen traders, or about 10% of the total, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 到 2028 年，华尔街的模型投资组合规模可能达到 11 万亿美元
item.description: Broadridge Financial Solutions 的数据显示，随着财务顾问越来越多地采用这些现成的投资策略，到 2023 年底，模型投资组合的资产可能达到 5.1 万亿美元。【原文：Assets in model portfolios likely reached $5.1 trillion at the end of 2023 as financial advisers increasingly embrace these off-the-shelf investment strategies, according to Broadridge Financial Solutions.】

item.title: Freepoint 顶级天然气交易员辞职创办自己的能源对冲基金
item.description: Freepoint Commodities LLC 的欧洲天然气实物交易主管 Freddie Sizer 已辞职，准备成立一家新的天然气和电力对冲基金。【原文：Freepoint Commodities LLC’s head of European physical gas trading, Freddie Sizer has resigned to set up an a new gas and power hedge fund.】
